title: This Is Not A Drill
description:
Ballistic missile threat inbound to Hawaii. Seek immediate shelter. 

A very special presentation of the day the world almost ended.

Season 10 Episode 1
itunes:title: This Is Not A Drill
itunes:subtitle: On January 13th, 2018, at exactly 8:07 in the morning, one text message turned the state of Hawaii into a state of emergency. From panic and fear to acceptance and joy, Snap Judgment explores the 38 minutes when the people of Hawaii faced an incoming bal
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
